item.text: Then Eliashib the high priest and his priestly colleagues arose and built the Sheep Gate. They dedicated it and erected its doors, working as far as the Tower of the Hundred and the Tower of Hananel.
The men of Jericho built adjacent to it, and Zaccur son of Imri built adjacent to them.
The sons of Hassenaah rebuilt the Fish Gate. They laid its beams and positioned its doors, its bolts, and its bars.

<st data-num="04822" class="">Meremoth</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0223" class="">Uriah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06976" class="">Hakoz</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> them. <st data-num="04918" class="">Meshullam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01296" class="">Berechiah</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04898" class="">Meshezabel</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">next to</st> them. And <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01195" class="">Baana</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> them.
The men of Tekoa worked on the section adjacent to them, but their town leaders would not assist with the work of their master.
Joiada son of Paseah and Meshullam son of Besodeiah worked on the Jeshanah Gate. They laid its beams and positioned its doors, its bolts, and its bars.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Adjacent to</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">them</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="04424" class="">Melatiah</st> the <st data-num="01393" class="">Gibeonite</st> and <st data-num="03036" class="">Jadon</st> the <st data-num="04824" class="">Meronothite</st>, who were <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="01391" class="">Gibeon</st> and <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st>. These towns were under the <st data-num="03678" class="">jurisdiction</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="06346" class="">governor</st> of <st data-num="05676" class="">Trans</st>-<st data-num="05104" class="">Euphrates</st>.

<st data-num="05816" class="">Uzziel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02736" class="">Harhaiah</st>, a member of the <st data-num="06884" class="">goldsmiths’</st> guild, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> him. <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, a <st data-num="01121" class="">member</st> of the <st data-num="07546" class="">perfumers’</st> guild, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> him. They <st data-num="05800" class="">plastered</st><n id="1" /> the city wall of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="07342" class="">Broad</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">Wall</st>.

<st data-num="07509" class="">Rephaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02354" class="">Hur</st>, <st data-num="08269" class="">head</st> of a <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> <st data-num="06418" class="">district</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> them.

<st data-num="03042" class="">Jedaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02739" class="">Harumaph</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> them <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="02407" class="">Hattush</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02813" class="">Hashabneiah</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">section</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">adjacent to</st> him.

<st data-num="04441" class="">Malkijah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02766" class="">Harim</st> and <st data-num="02815" class="">Hasshub</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06355" class="">Pahath Moab</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">section</st> and the <st data-num="04026" class="">Tower</st> of the <st data-num="08574" class="">Ovens</st>.
Shallum son of Hallohesh, head of a half district of Jerusalem, worked on the section adjacent to him, assisted by his daughters.

Hanun and the residents of Zanoah worked on the Valley Gate. They rebuilt it and positioned its doors, its bolts, and its bars, in addition to working on 1,500 feet of the wall as far as the Dung Gate.
Malkijah son of Recab, head of the district of Beth Hakkerem, worked on the Dung Gate. He rebuilt it and positioned its doors, its bolts, and its bars.

Shallun son of Col-Hozeh, head of the district of Mizpah, worked on the Fountain Gate. He rebuilt it, put on its roof, and positioned its doors, its bolts, and its bars. In addition, he rebuilt the wall of the Pool of Siloam, by the royal garden, as far as the steps that go down from the City of David.
Nehemiah son of Azbuk, head of a half district of Beth Zur, worked after him as far as the tombs of David and the artificial pool and the House of the Warriors.
After him the Levites worked—Rehum son of Bani and after him Hashabiah, head of half the district of Keilah, for his district.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him their <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st>—<st data-num="0942" class="">Binnui</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02582" class="">Henadad</st>, <st data-num="08269" class="">head</st> of a <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> <st data-num="06418" class="">district</st> of <st data-num="07084" class="">Keilah</st>.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Adjacent to</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">him</st> <st data-num="05829" class="">Ezer</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03442" class="">Jeshua</st>, <st data-num="08269" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">section</st>, <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> the <st data-num="05927" class="">ascent</st> to the <st data-num="05402" class="">armory</st> at the <st data-num="04740" class="">buttress</st>.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him <st data-num="01263" class="">Baruch</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02079" class="">Zabbai</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">section</st>, <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04740" class="">buttress</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">door</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="0475" class="">Eliashib</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.
After him Meremoth son of Uriah, the son of Hakkoz, worked on another section from the door of Eliashib’s house to the end of it.
After him the priests worked, men of the nearby district.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> them <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> and <st data-num="02815" class="">Hasshub</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> their <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> them <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04641" class="">Maaseiah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06055" class="">Ananiah</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">near</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him <st data-num="01131" class="">Binnui</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02582" class="">Henadad</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">section</st>, from the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04740" class="">buttress</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="06438" class="">corner</st>.

After him <st data-num="06420" class="">Palal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0186" class="">Uzai</st> worked<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> the <st data-num="04740" class="">buttress</st> and the <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st> that <st data-num="03318" class="">protrudes</st> from the <st data-num="05945" class="">upper</st> <st data-num="01004 04428">palace</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st> of the <st data-num="04307" class="">guard</st>. <st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him <st data-num="06305" class="">Pedaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06551" class="">Parosh</st>

and the <st data-num="05411" class="">temple servants</st> who <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> on <st data-num="06077" class="">Ophel</st> worked<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">up to</st> the <st data-num="05048" class="">area opposite</st> the <st data-num="04325" class="">Water</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st> toward the <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> and the <st data-num="03318" class="">protruding</st> <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st>.
After them the men of Tekoa worked on another section, from opposite the great protruding tower to the wall of Ophel.
Above the Horse Gate the priests worked, each in front of his house.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> them <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0564" class="">Immer</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> him <st data-num="08098" class="">Shemaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07935" class="">Shecaniah</st>, <st data-num="08104" class="">guard</st> at the <st data-num="04217" class="">East</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st>.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08018" class="">Shelemiah</st>, and <st data-num="02586" class="">Hanun</st>, the <st data-num="08345" class="">sixth</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06764" class="">Zalaph</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked on</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">section</st>. <st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> them <st data-num="04918" class="">Meshullam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01296" class="">Berechiah</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> his <st data-num="05393" class="">quarters</st>.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> him <st data-num="04441" class="">Malkijah</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="06885" class="">goldsmiths</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of the <st data-num="05411" class="">temple servants</st> and the <st data-num="07402" class="">traders</st>, <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> the <st data-num="04663" class="">Inspection</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05704" class="">up to</st> the <st data-num="05944" class="">room above</st> the <st data-num="06438" class="">corner</st>.
And between the room above the corner and the Sheep Gate the goldsmiths and traders worked.
